page.shortlink: UX Properties Validation and Error Reporting
page.description: Properties for implementing and styling the validation and error reporting in an application.

section.description: On many applications there is a need to prevent users from submitting certain types of data, conflicting data, or wrong data into a field. For example, when signing up for a service online it is often necessary to provide a user login. In the case that a login name is already in use, anyone trying to register that same login name will usually get an error message. This is validation and error reporting and it can be carried out on either the client-side or the server-side.
